autoAlign.name: Enable auto align on desktop
autoAlign.description[zh_CN]: 用于控制是否启用桌面自动排列
autoAlign.description: It's used to control whether the auto align on desktop is enabled.

maskOffsetX.name: Horizontal Offset
maskOffsetX.description[zh_CN]: 相对系统水印左上角的水平偏移距离，左为负值，右为正值
maskOffsetX.description: The horizontal offset distance relative to the topleft of the system watermark, the right is a plus, and the left is a reduce

maskOffsetY.name: Vertical Offset
maskOffsetY.description[zh_CN]: 相对系统水印左上角的竖直偏移距离，上为负值，下为正值
maskOffsetY.description: The vertical offset distance relative to the topleft of the system watermark, the up is a plus, and the down is a reduce

enableMask.name: Enable WaterMask
enableMask.description: It's used to control whether to enable the WaterMask.
